name: CatDeathChase Clone
description:
A clone of DeathChase(1983)  Control: 

‘1’ - Steer left

‘0’ - Steer right

‘8’ - Decelerate

‘9’ -Accelerate  

Space - Shoot bullet

Version: 

1.0 (9/15)

2.0 (9/16)

- Fixed the bug that one enemy can be attacked twice

- Played around with collision detection, hope it feels better now

- It says "Day/Night  Pawtrol" now !(idea credits to Nate Smith )
